meanings: (아래로) lower, let down, take down, (차량에서) unload
(승객 등을) drop sb off, (Brit) set sb down
(값·온도 등을) lower, drop, reduce, bring down, (값·세금 등을) cut, (값을) mark down
(눈·비·이슬 등이) fall, come down, (비가) rain, (눈이) snow
(타고 있던 것에서) get off, leave, (formal) alight from, (배·비행기에서) (formal) disembark, (말·자전거에서) dismount

vlive.korean: 내릴 때 슈스타처럼 보였다고요? When I got off, I looked like Superstar? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
vlive.english: When I got off, I looked like Superstar?

vlive.english: "Sowon, you don't plan to have bangs?" I don't!

vlive.english: [What floor we are now?] [lose all the faith in other members' drawing] What floor was it? I can just ...
